- Row 8: Tied at 0-0.

Looking back:

Row 5: FC Metz won both rounds, so they got two wins (6 points). But the other team, FC Mulhouse, lost both. Since each round is a match, losing both would mean 0 points for them.

In Row 6: Sète had one draw and one loss, so at least 1 point from the first round.

Row 7: Bourg lost one and drew another, so they have 1 point.

Looking through all rows:

Only in Row 5 does a team (FC Mulhouse) lose both rounds, getting zero points. So only one team failed to score any points.
